Auth.consent: I confirm my understanding of [the personal data processing terms](https://paas.sk/ochrana-osobnych-udajov/) and [terms and conditions](https://paas.sk/vseobecne-obchodne-podmienky/) in Bratislava. I'm aware that the parking policy conditions may change under [Regulation No. 6/2023 and the Operating Regulations](https://paas.sk/dokumenty/).
Auth.verificationText: Continue by entering 6-digit code from message we’ve sent.

errors.InvalidParameterException: Enter the phone number in international format (+421…)

AddParkingCards.instructions: If you are registered in PAAS, enter the email address you entered when creating your account. Thanks to it, we will be able to upload all your parking cards and cars connected to Bonus card.
AddParkingCards.verifyYourEmailInfo:
We’ve sent verification email to 
**{{email}}** 

Copy the verification code from the email and confirm the verification. Once confirmed, we will upload your parking cards to the application.
AddParkingCards.noParkingCardDescription: If you don't have a parking card in PAAS yet, you can easily register on the website [www.paas.sk](https://paas.sk/).

parkingCardModal.title:
Do you have any
 parking cards?
parkingCardModal.message: Great! Add them by verifying your email address and enjoy the discounts.

Errors.TooLongParkingTime: The parking time has exceeded the maximum possible duration. The maximum length of a parking ticket is 48 hours.
Errors.TooShortParkingTime: The minimum parking duration is 15 minutes.
Errors.FreeTicket: Parking is free during this time period. It is not possible to purchase a parking ticket.
Errors.InsufficientCredit: There is insufficient credit on the visitor parking card.
Errors.CardNotValid: The visitor parking card is not valid.
Errors.NoUsableParkingCardFound: The specified type of parking card is not in use or the parking card was not found.
Errors.PermitCardActive: It is not possible to purchase a ticket for this parking segment. For plate number {{ecv}} and this segment a residential or subscriber parking card already exists.
Errors.InvalidParkingTime: Invalid parking duration, parking must end in the future.
Errors.InvalidParkingStart: Invalid parking duration. The start of a new ticket can only occur after the original ticket has expired.
Errors.InvalidParkingEnd: It is not possible to terminate the parking ticket prematurely at this time.
Errors.TicketAlreadyExists: A parking ticket for the section {{udr}} and the vehicle registration number {{ecv}} already exists.
Errors.TicketAlreadyShortened: The parking ticket has already been terminated prematurely once.
Errors.LicencePlate: Please insert or choose your vehicle.

warnings.differentEnd: The parking end differs because minimum parking time of paid ticket is 15 minutes. The new ticket will be valid till {{time}}.

ShortenTicket.title: Terminate ticket
ShortenTicket.infoText: The shortening of a parking ticket is possible under certain conditions regulated by the [Operating Order for Temporary Parking of Motor Vehicles in the capital city of the Slovak Republic, Bratislava](https://paas.sk/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Operating-Order-PP_v2.15.pdf).
conditions: Shortening the ticket is possible after 15 minutes have elapsed from the start of the ticket's validity. If you shorten the ticket earlier, the ticket will only be terminated after the expiration of the 15-minute period. (This does not apply if the ticket was purchased exclusively through the Bonus or Visitor Parking Card.)
The ticket can be shortened for a cancellation fee of €0.05 (This does not apply if the ticket was purchased exclusively through the Visitor or Bonus Card.)
In the case of immediate shortening of a ticket purchased exclusively through the Bonus Parking Card, a full minute will be deducted from the parking card.
In the case of extending a parking ticket, it will be possible to shorten the last extension.
ShortenTicket.failedText: Your ticket has not been shortened. Please try again.

VehiclesScreen.licencePlateDuplicate: Vehicle with this license plate already exists.

deleteAccountConfirmModal.title: We’re sorry to see you go...

Tickets.noHistoryTicketsText: After bought ticket expires, it's shown here.

ParkingCards.title: Parking cards
ParkingCards.paasEmailsList: Choose an email to continue and show cards that are attached
ParkingCards.noParkingCardDescription: If you don't have a parking card in PAAS yet, you can easily register on the website [www.paas.sk](https://paas.sk/).
ParkingCards.noEmailsText: To add your cards to the app, please connect with your PAAS account.
ParkingCards.noActiveCardsText: All parking cards expired. Once you’ll buy new parking card, it will show here.
ParkingCards.removeEmailText: Are you sure you want to remove this email address? Without an email address, it will not be possible to view or use your parking cards.

verified.title: Parking cards added
verified.text: Your parking cards email **{{email}}** has been added. You can see your cards in the Parking cards section.
verified.vehicleText_one: Vehicle with license plate **{{licencePlatesString}}** added as well. You can manage your vehicles in the section Vehicles.
verified.vehicleText_other: Vehicles with license plates **{{licencePlatesString}}** added as well. You can manage your vehicles in the section Vehicles.

verified-no-cards.title: No parking cards
verified-no-cards.text:
We apologize, but no parking cards were found for the email address {{email}}.

Please contact [paas.sk](https://paas.sk/casto-kladene-otazky/) support.

link-expired.title: Link expired
link-expired.text:
We are sorry, but link to verify your email has expired. Resend email to {{email}} and verify it again.

Click on Verify button in the email to approve verification and we will then add parking cards directly to the app.

ZoneBottomSheet.title: Where are you parking?
ZoneBottomSheet.searchAccessibilityInput: Search for a place or address
ZoneBottomSheet.noZoneSelected: No parking zones found. Use search or place the pin to a parking zone nearby.
ZoneBottomSheet.zoomIn: Zoom in to see all parking zones in this area.

Errors.422: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
Errors.axiosGeneric: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

welcome.title: Welcome to PAAS City Parking App
welcome.text: Through the application operated by the City of Bratislava, you can pay the hourly parking fee or use a bonus or visitor parking card.

visitorsFree.title: Your visitors can park for free
visitorsFree.text: With the visitor parking card you invite your friends and family to park for free.

bonusCard.title: Park 2 hours with a 100% discount every day
bonusCard.text: Enjoy two hours of free parking in specific zones with the bonus card.

parkingCards.title: Parking cards are easy to use
parkingCards.text: Verify your email associated with PAAS to easily upload your parking cards and enjoy discounted parking.

dataSecurity.title: Data security and simplicity
dataSecurity.text: The City of Bratislava made the app to be simple and easy to use.

helpUsPlan.title: Help us plan Bratislava better
helpUsPlan.text: Thanks to the use of this application, you support the creation of better transport and its planning in Bratislava.

location.title: Location services
location.text: Enable location services so we can find the nearest parking lot for you.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.text: Enable notifications to get alerts for offers and when your parking ends.

locationDenied.title: Location access is denied
locationDenied.text: To see nearby parking areas go to App settings in your phone and allow location permissions.

locationOff.title: Location services is off
locationOff.text: To see nearby parking areas go to App settings in your phone and enable location services.

useSignInOrSignUp.unexpectedErrorObjectInSignIn: Unexpected error. Unknown error object during sign in.
useSignInOrSignUp.unexpectedErrorObjectInConfirm: Unexpected error. Unknown error object during confirm flow.

success.text: Thanks to your feedback and suggestions, we can improve the PAAS application.
